virtual module¶

Virtual can.Device for testing programs.

class virtual.Virtual¶

Bases: canPDOMonitor.can.Device

Virtual device class that sends all sorts of data in PDO frames

inherits from can.Device.

Streams data at 1kHz, single float on 0x181 and 7Q8 on 0x281, 0x381 and 0x481
